column4: Does anyone know how to link two mono channels together in Gnome Volume Control?
i think you should use jackd
JACK will allow me to do that, and have a nice little volume slider desktop widget?
i don't about nice/not nice. you will be able to do whatever you want. route audio etc. with realtime scheduling.
